title: Robotics for K-12 Educators
description: The use of robots as the centerpiece of constructivist learning projects in K-12 classrooms. Project-based. Learning to build and program robots and design constructivist lessons around them. No engineering background required. 3 seminars, 1 activity.
prerequisites: EDUC 480 or EDUC 481 or EDUC 507 or consent of instructor
